sentences.en: Although strictly illogical, Martin's interpretation of this paradox seems the best.
sentences.cn: 马丁对于这一悖论的解释尽管严格说来不合乎逻辑, 卻似乎是最好的解释了.

sentences.en: Division arose over the interpretation of the idea.
sentences.cn: 对这个观点的解释产生了分歧.

sentences.en: Even if her interpretation has not yet gelled into a satisfying whole, she displays real musicianship.
sentences.cn: 虽然她的演绎在整体上还不太令人满意，但她表现出了真正的音乐才华。

sentences.en: Her evidence suggests a different interpretation of the events.
sentences.cn: 她的证据显示这些事件可能有另外一种解释。

sentences.en: His interpretation is coherent and intelligible.
His statement admits of one interpretation only.
His statement is susceptible of another interpretation.
sentences.cn: 他的陈述可以有另一种解释.

sentences.en: History is always a matter of interpretation.
sentences.cn: 历史总是一种阐释角度的问题。

sentences.en: I like your interpretation better than the one I was taught.
sentences.cn: 你的解释比我以前学过的更让我喜欢。

sentences.en: I was frankly astonished at the degree to which different singers can affect the interpretation of a song.
sentences.cn: 说实话，不同歌手对一首歌曲有如此不同的诠释让我感到惊讶。

sentences.en: It’s difficult to put an accurate interpretation on (= explain ) the survey results.
sentences.cn: 对调查结果难以作出确切的解释。

sentences.en: Language interpretation is the whole point of the act of reading.
sentences.cn: 阅读行为中关键在于对语言的理解。

sentences.en: One possible interpretation is that they want you to resign.
sentences.cn: 一种可能的解释是，他们想要你辞职。

sentences.en: The conference hall is provided with facilities for simultaneous interpretation in five languages.
sentences.cn: 这个会议大厅配有五种语言的同声传译设备.

sentences.en: Their interpretation was faulty — they had misinterpreted things.
sentences.cn: 他们的理解是错误的——他们将事情曲解了。

sentences.en: This rule does not allow of more than one interpretation.
sentences.cn: 这条规则只能有一种解释.

sentences.en: What exactly the author meant by that statement is open to interpretation (= able to be understood or explained in different ways ).
sentences.cn: 作者这句话的确切含义可有各种理解。

words.tran_cn: 可说明的；可判断的；可翻译的

trans.tran_cn: 解释，说明，翻译，表演，演绎，理解
trans.tran_en: the way in which someone explains or understands an event, information, someone’s actions etc
